entry.title: SPECIAL WEATHER STATEMENT , Kawartha Lakes (Lindsay)
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 01:11 AM EST Thursday 09 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Clear, -3.7°C

entry.title: Wednesday night: Clear. Low minus 5.
entry.summary: Clear. Becoming partly cloudy after midnight. Fog patches developing overnight. Low minus 5. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Wednesday 08 February 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Rain. High 8.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Rain beginning in the morning. Risk of freezing rain late in the morning and early afternoon. Fog patches dissipating in the morning. Rainfall amount 10 to 20 mm. Wind becoming southeast 20 km/h in the morning. High 8. Wind chill minus 7 in the morning. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Wednesday 08 February 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Chance of showers. Low plus 1. POP 40%
entry.summary: A few showers ending late in the evening then cloudy with 40 percent chance of showers. Wind southeast 20 km/h becoming southwest 30 gusting to 50 late in the evening. Low plus 1. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Wednesday 08 February 2023
